chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: eqType
x: eqType_X X
A: list X

Goal:
x :: A === x :: rem A x

Premises:
rem = fun A x => filter (fun z : X => Dec (z <> x)) A : list X -> X -> list X Arguments rem _%list_scope
eqType_X = fun e : eqType => let (eqType_X, _) := e in eqType_X : eqType -> Type eqType_X is a coercion
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record eqType : Type := EqType { eqType_X : Type; eqType_dec : eq_dec eqType_X } Arguments EqType X%type_scope {eqType_dec}%function_scope : rename
equi_dup : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A : list X), x :: A === x :: x :: A
equi_swap : forall (X : Type) (x y : X) (A : list X), x :: y :: A === y :: x :: A
equi_push : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A : list X), x el A -> A === x :: A
equi_shift : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), x :: A ++ B === A ++ x :: B
equi_rotate : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A : list X), x :: A === A ++ [x]
rem_app' : forall x (A B C : list X), rem A x <<= C -> rem B x <<= C -> rem (A ++ B) x <<= C
rem_cons' : forall A B x y, x el B -> rem A y <<= B -> rem (x :: A) y <<= B
rem_mono : forall A B x, A <<= B -> rem A x <<= rem B x
rem_cons : forall A B x, A <<= B -> rem (x :: A) x <<= B
rem_in : forall x y A, x el rem A y -> x el A
rem_app : forall x A B, x el A -> B <<= A ++ rem B x
in_rem_iff : forall x A y, x el rem A y < -> x el A /\ x <> y
rem_incl : forall A x, rem A x <<= A
rem_neq : forall x y A, x <> y -> x el A -> x el rem A y
rem_not_in : forall x y A, x = y \/ ~ x el A -> ~ x el rem A y
incl_shift : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), A <<= B -> x :: A <<= x :: B
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P [] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P [] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
eqType_CS : forall X : Type, eq_dec X -> eqType
EqType : forall X : Type, eq_dec X -> eqType
list_cycle : forall (X : Type) (A : list X) (x : X), x :: A <> A
incl_lcons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), x :: A <<= B < -> x el B /\ A <<= B
filter_fst : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> bool) (x : X) (A : list X), p x -> filter p (x :: A) = x :: filter p A
incl_sing : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A : list X) (y : X), x :: A <<= [y] -> x = y /\ A <<= [y]

```coq
intros.
rewrite equi_swap.
apply equi_push.
apply rem_in.
apply rem_incl.
Qed.
```

original: intros. rewrite equi_swap. apply equi_push. apply rem_in. apply rem_incl.
